text: Pterocarya tonkinensis (越南枫杨, yue nan feng yang) is a tree in the Juglandaceae family that grows up to 30 meters in height, endemic to Laos, Vietnam and southern Yunnan, China. ==References== * Bull. Soc. Dendrol. France 70: 67 1929. * The Plant List tonkinensis Category:Trees of China Category:Trees of Laos Category:Trees of Vietnam Category:Plants described in 1898
title: Pterocarya tonkinensis
